name: Pumpkin Carving Simulator (EthanAShulman)
description:
Realistic pumpkin carving simulation in browser on PC and mobile, using a custom WebGL raytracing implementation. Click or touch to carve the pumpkin, configure options on the bottom tool bar and render the result.

You can also load a desired image onto the pumpkin as a carving by going to Pumpkin Settings(Wrench) -> Scroll down to Load Pumpkin Map.
